meanings.sent1: The pellicle of the bubble shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She carefully peeled off the pellicle of plastic covering the screen.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to chase the pellicle of light reflecting off the mirror.
meanings.sent4: The morning mist draped the valley like a delicate pellicle.
meanings.sent5: The pellicle of dust settled on the old book, giving it a mysterious aura.

meanings.definition: A thin layer of protein on the surface of a liquid
meanings.sent1: The chef carefully skimmed off the pellicle forming on the soup.
meanings.sent2: The pellicle on the pond indicated the presence of algae.
meanings.sent3: The pellicle on the milk made it look like a science experiment gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The pellicle on the wine added a unique flavor to the drink.
meanings.sent5: The pellicle on the lake shimmered like a delicate blanket of silk.

meanings.sent1: The pellicle of frost covered the window on the chilly morning.
meanings.sent2: The pellicle of paint on the wall was starting to peel off.
meanings.sent3: The pellicle of sugar on the donut made it extra sweet.
meanings.sent4: The pellicle of dust on the old vase revealed its age.
meanings.sent5: The pellicle of mist enveloped the forest in a mysterious haze.
